subtitle: Private Solana Wallet
promotional_text: The privacy standard for Web3. Send and receive SOL privately with stealth addresses.
description:
SIP Privacy is a privacy-first Solana wallet that shields your transactions using stealth addresses and Pedersen commitments.

KEY FEATURES

• Shielded Payments - Send SOL privately with hidden sender, amount, and recipient
• Stealth Addresses - One-time addresses prevent transaction linking
• Viewing Keys - Share read-only access for compliance without exposing spending ability
• Jupiter DEX - Swap tokens with optional privacy protection
• Background Scanning - Get notified when you receive payments
• Multiple Privacy Providers - Choose SIP Native, Arcium, Privacy Cash, and more

PRIVACY BY DEFAULT

Unlike traditional wallets where all transactions are public, SIP Privacy uses cryptographic techniques to protect your financial privacy:

• Pedersen Commitments hide transaction amounts
• Stealth addresses prevent address reuse tracking
• Viewing keys enable selective disclosure for audits

COMPLIANCE READY

SIP Privacy is designed for both individual privacy and institutional compliance:

• Export viewing keys for auditors
• Track disclosures with expiration dates
• Generate compliance reports
• Privacy score dashboard

BUILT ON SOLANA

• Fast transactions (400ms finality)
• Low fees (< $0.001 per transaction)
• Decentralized - your keys, your crypto
• Open source on GitHub

SECURITY

• Native key management with SecureStore
• Biometric authentication (Face ID / Touch ID)
• Optional PIN backup
• No third-party key custody

Note: This app requires a Solana wallet. You can create a new wallet or import an existing seed phrase.
release_notes: Initial release with shielded payments, Jupiter DEX integration, and viewing key management.
